The ability to have children (fertility) is usually normal in both males and females with aromatase excess syndrome.",GHR,aromatase excess syndrome
How many people are affected by aromatase excess syndrome ?,The prevalence of aromatase excess syndrome is unknown; more than 20 cases have been described in the medical literature.,GHR,a
